description:
*What's new? Check further down.*
intervalGym is a simple yet powerful Interval Timer Application for you Pre and Pixi. Perfect for Power Workout's! Easy Usage: Set how long you want to train without a break. Set how long you want to rest between the workout and set how often you want to repeat these Steps. 
intervalGym wont stop your music like other interval timers do and you are able to select you own sounds. Giving your training just the right touch. With the support for training profiles, more then one person can use it or you can quickly change between training methods.
This App fully supports the Pixi and Pre in all Directions. Cool while using your touchstone! Another great future: You are able to set Warmup Time and Cooldown Time. This App futures the advanced Tabata training sequence.
Feel free to comment this app. You will be heard! Contact mail@j-liebl.de if you have any problems installing it. Otherwise use the inbuild support function.
*Update brings support for HP Touchpad and Pre 3. Also sound playback was improved.*
